name: Acting Performance
description: Evaluation criteria for lead and supporting acting roles.
author: the-zinny team

criteria.name: Emotional Range
criteria.description: Ability to portray an appropiate spectrum of emotions for the character.

criteria.name: Character Authenticity
criteria.description: Believability and depth in embodying the character.

criteria.name: Physicality
criteria.description: Use of body language, movement, and gestures.

criteria.name: Contribution to Story
criteria.description: The role's impact on the narrative.

criteria.name: Cultural Relevance
criteria.description: Significance of the character's themes or representation.
